name: Mouse Playhouse
description: Discover a world in which you solve challenging puzzles, overcome evil "Meowbots" and seize the cheese!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
